mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xueshengjiuye_uuid_number as xueshengjiuyeUuidNumber ,a.xueshengjiuye_address as xueshengjiuyeAddress ,a.xueshengjiuye_gongsi as xueshengjiuyeGongsi ,a.xueshengjiuye_zhiwei as xueshengjiuyeZhiwei ,a.xueshengjiuye_xinzi as xueshengjiuyeXinzi ,a.jiuye_time as jiuyeTime ,a.xueshengjiuye_content as xueshengjiuyeContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.jiuye_types as jiuyeTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM xueshengjiuye a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xueshengjiuye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengjiuyeUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xueshengjiuye_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengjiuyeAddress},'%')
and a.xueshengjiuye_gongsi like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengjiuyeGongsi},'%')
and a.xueshengjiuye_zhiwei like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengjiuyeZhiwei},'%')
and a.xueshengjiuye_xinzi >= #{params.xueshengjiuyeXinziStart}
and a.xueshengjiuye_xinzi <= #{params.xueshengjiuyeXinziEnd}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiuye_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiuyeTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiuye_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiuyeTimeEnd})
and a.xueshengjiuye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengjiuyeContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.jiuye_types = #{params.jiuyeTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
